text:
Good morning!  Do you know great salespeople?  New Breed is hiring for sales both <https://www.hulalakeside.com/|in Vermont> and remotely!  Here are links to our <https://www.newbreedrevenue.com/careers?gnk=job&gni=8a78879e7b7f6264017ba293e3cd38a0&lang=en|Senior> and <https://www.newbreedrevenue.com/careers?gnk=job&gni=8a78879e7b7f6264017b9427327156f8&lang=en|Principal> level sales positions.  

Our sales team culture is positive and supportive, celebrating wins collectively, not competitively. We're thoughtful in our consultative engagements and focus on selling the right thing (and not "all the things").

If this resonates with someone you may know, I'd love to have an exploratory conversation. Please send them my way or they can message me directly at <mailto:tsenesi@newbreedmarketing.com|tsenesi@newbreedmarketing.com>.  Thanks!
